properties.description: Indicates the direction of its child segments
properties.name: direction

properties.description: Indicates whether the segment is minimized or not
properties.name: minimized

properties.description: Name of the segment, used as a title for its tab
properties.name: name

properties.description: Indicates the type of the segment ("Tabs", "Wrapper", "Content")
properties.name: type

methods.description: Creates the tab for the requested segment and adds its events, then appends it to its own tabs div
methods.name: addTab

params.description: name of the segment to be used as the title of the tab
params.name: name

methods.description: Handles the close request from the tab close button
methods.name: close

methods.description: Creates the outer drop areas detection for the segment
methods.name: createOuterDetectionIfRequired

methods.description: Deselects the requested tab
methods.name: deselectTab

methods.description: Creates its tab section and adds its own tab
methods.name: generateOwnTabIfRequired

methods.description: Gets the nearest segment/docker looping through parents
methods.name: getHolder

methods.description: Returns the current selected tab
methods.name: getSelectedTab

methods.description: Returns a sibling for the requested tab
methods.name: getSiblingTab

methods.description: Appends/removes the gutter depending on the situation
methods.name: handleGutterExistence

methods.description: Handles the assigning of a fixed width/height so that we resize the requested segment without issues
methods.name: handleGutterMousedown

methods.description: Handles the detection of the position of the inner drop area and calculates were the indicator should move
methods.name: handleInnerDetection

methods.description: Handles the redirection to the corresponding inner drop callback depending on the situacion
methods.name: handleInnerDrop

methods.description: Handles the detection of the position of the outer drop area and calculates were the indicator should move
methods.name: handleOuterDetection

methods.description: Handles the outer dropping
methods.name: handleOuterDrop

methods.description: Handles all the inner dropping except for the center one
methods.name: handleSimpleInnerDrop

methods.description: Handles the movement of the tab over a tab region and shows/moves the indicator
methods.name: handleTabsDetection

methods.description: Handles some preparations for the calling of handleTabsTypeDrop
methods.name: handleTabsRegionDrop

methods.description: Handles the inner center and the tabs region dropping
methods.name: handleTabsTypeDrop

methods.description: Returns a boolean indicating whether the segment has been resized or not
methods.name: isResized

methods.description: Minimizes the segment
methods.name: minimize

methods.description: Removes its outer drop areas detection
methods.name: removeOuterDetectionIfRequired

methods.description: Removes the requested tab and selects its sibling if theres any
methods.name: removeTab

methods.description: Reorders the tabs reasigning a new tab order depending on their current position
methods.name: reorderTabs

methods.description: Resets the size of the segment reassigning some style
methods.name: resetSize

methods.description: Restores the minimized segment to where it belongs
methods.name: restore

methods.description: Compares to objects to see if both have the same keys
methods.name: sameKeys

methods.description: Handles the tabs scrolling
methods.name: scroll

methods.description: Selects the requested tab and deselects the current one
methods.name: selectTab

methods.description: Sets up the bookmark
methods.name: setupBookmark

methods.description: Saves the references to the user content nodes
methods.name: setupContent

methods.description: Sets up basic properties for the data object
methods.name: setupData

methods.description: Sets up the basic dragging events to the segment
methods.name: setupDraggingEvents

methods.description: Sets up the gutter and saves the reference, it will only be appended if its needed
methods.name: setupGutter

methods.description: Sets up the inner drop areas detection
methods.name: setupInnerDetection

methods.description: Sets up the outer drop areas detection
methods.name: setupOuterDetection

methods.description: Sets up the tabs section
methods.name: setupTabs

methods.description: Sets up the tab drag events for the tabs region
methods.name: setupTabsDetection

methods.description: Moves the user content nodes to its corresponding content node
methods.name: transferContent

methods.description: Transfers the size of the segment parameter to itself
methods.name: transferSize

methods.description: Removes the tabs section from the segment
methods.name: wipeTabsSection
